title: 1-bedroom apartment fĞ¾r sĞ°le
description: One bedroom apartment in Tersefanou community, in Larnaca District..The property benefits from its proximity to a wide range of amenities and services, including supermarkets, cafes, and restaurants, ensuring convenience for residents. Furthermore, it is situated approximately 4 kilometers north of the coastal shores of Pervolia, offering easy access to the sea. Additionally, Larnaca International Airport is only a 15-minute drive away..The apartment was constructed in 2010 and it is located on the ground floor of the building. It comprises of kitchen/living room/dining room as an open space, one bedroom, bathroom with WC, covered veranda and uncovered veranda. Furthermore, it has parking space and a yard with an area of 76 sqm on the ground floor. There is common swimming pool in the complex..The area of the internal spaces is 52 sqm, and the covered veranda is 10 sqm..The flat is vacant and it is considered as ideal choice as it is suitable for rental (short term or long term) or for private use..The flat has separate title deed.
